attr.title: Monolith / Star of Providence
attr.desc: Descending in the darkness of a long-abandoned facility, a lone ship searches for wealth, power, and the scattered pieces of the past.
attr.inst:
FOR ITCH

Purchase the game from itch.io (https://team-d-13.itch.io/monolith), grab the Windows version (Monolith.exe), and copy it into ports/monolith folder.

FOR STEAM

Purchase the game from Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/603960/Star_of_Providence), download using download_depot 603960 603961 7781865563262412532, and copy Monolith.exe into ports/monolith folder
attr.inst_md:
FOR ITCH

Purchase the game from [itch.io](https://team-d-13.itch.io/monolith), grab the Windows version (*Monolith.exe*), and and copy it into `ports/monolith` folder.

FOR STEAM

Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/603960/Star_of_Providence), download using `download_depot 603960 603961 7781865563262412532`, and copy Monolith.exe into ports/monolith folder
